Web USB LED

dev board RobotDyn M0 mini
firmware Arduino
chip SAMD21
features WebUSB

Before starting

Dependancies

Ensure the following dependancies are downloaded and available:
  • WebUSB Compatible Arduino hardware
  • Web USB receive

Pre-requisites

Try these simpler or similar examples:
  1. Web USB detect

Code

Download code View demo webusb-led-demo.html

Browser console

Open the browser developer console.

Description

Turn on/off LED on-board compatible arduino hardware through a button press in the browser on the laptop which is connected to the hardware.

Use this firmware with the mcu firmware.

References

  1. Access USB Devices on the Web
  2. List of compatible arduino hardware
  3. Web USB serial.js
